test.name: rcftest
test.objective: Tests on RCF functionality.

test.name: rpctest
test.objective: Tests on RCF RPC functionality.

test.name: tad-ts
test.objective: Tests on TAD functionality.

test.name: prologue
test.objective: Prepare testing networks.

test.name: common
test.objective: Tests on generic TAD functionality.

test.name: poll_zero_csaps
test.objective: Check that rcf_trpoll() returns TE_EINVAL, if it is called zero number of CSAPs.

test.name: poll_null_csaps
test.objective: Check that rcf_trpoll() returns TE_EFAULT, if it is called with positive number of CSAPs and NULL csaps pointer.

test.name: poll_invalid_only
test.objective: Check rcf_trpoll() behaviour with only invalid CSAP.

test.name: poll_one
test.objective: Check rcf_trpoll() behaviour with one CSAP only and different scenarious.

test.name: atm
test.objective: CSAP ATM layer tests

test.name: simple_send
test.objective: Check possibility of CSAP ATM layer creation and sending a cell using created CSAP.

test.name: simple_recv
test.objective: Check possibility of CSAP ATM layer creation and receiving/matching cells using created CSAP.

test.name: aal5_send
test.objective: Check possibility of CSAP AAL5 layer creation and sending data using created CSAP.

test.name: eth
test.objective: Ethernet CSAP testing.

test.name: send_recv
test.objective: Check possibility of Ethernet CSAP to send and receive 802.1Q untagged/tagged frames, Ethernet2 vs LLC/SNAP encapsulated frames.

test.name: ipstack
test.objective: Tests on TAD IP stack (IPv4, ICMPv4, IPv6, ICMPv6, UDP, TCP functionality.

test.name: ip4_raw_send
test.objective: Check that ip4.eth CSAP can send correctly formed IP datagrams.

test.name: ip4_send_icmp
test.objective: Check that ip4.eth CSAP can send ICMP datagrams with user-specified type, code and checksum fields.

test.name: ip4_send_udp
test.objective: Check that udp.ip4.eth CSAP can send UDP datagrams with user-specified ports and checksum.

test.name: ip4_send_icmp_error_udp
test.objective: Check that udp.ip4.icmp4.ip4.eth CSAP can be used to send ICMP datagrams with user-specified UDP error reply messages.

test.name: selftad
test.objective: Tests on TAD functionality.

test.name: prologue
test.objective: Assign IPv4 address in test networks.

test.name: snmp
test.objective: Tests on TAD SNMP functionality.

test.name: eth
test.objective: Ethernet CSAP tests

test.name: ipstack
test.objective: Tests on TAD IP stack functionality.

test.name: iscsi
test.objective: Tests on TAD iSCSI csap functionality.

test.name: dhcp
test.objective: Tests on TAD DHCP functionality.

test.name: cs-ts
test.objective: Tests on Configurator functionality.

test.name: xen
test.objective: Tests on XEN functionality.
